thread.title: Official Raspberry Pi Touch Display Released at $60
thread.title_full: Official Raspberry Pi Touch Display Released at $60 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Official Raspberry Pi Touch Display Released at $60
text: The Raspberry Pi has all kinds of cool modules and various third-party components, but now it can also boast with a nice and official touch display developed by the same team. The new touch display for Raspberry Pi is developed by the same team who built the mini-PC itself, and it's been in the works for the past three years. It took them a long time because they always had other more important projects to take care of, but they finally got enough time to finish the project... Â»
